pullRequest.title: Add Rewind/Forward option in Video Player
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
LEARNER-7701
The video player should have video rewind and forward button options.

Add rewind and forward button in video player
on clicking rewind button video will be rewind for 10 secs
on clicking forward button video will be forwarded for 15 sec

How to test this PR


The options should be displayed when the user would tap on a video screen along with the play/pause button, The position of the buttons would be left and right of the play/pause button.


Tapping on the forward video button will skip the video for 15 seconds interval.


Tapping on the rewind video button will skip the video for 10 seconds interval.


Tapping on the rewind and the forward button will play the text animation for the specific skip interval. On rewind button tapping the “-10“ will be animate and on taping forward button “+15” text will animate. The purpose of this animation text is to show how many intervals the video will be skipped in either direction.

nodes.bodyText: IMO, We can use semi_transparent_gray_circle as background.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -102,12 +90,81 @@
         android:contentDescription="@string/video_player_previous"
         app:iconName="fa-chevron-circle-left" />
 
+    <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_gravity="center">
+
+        <View
+            android:layout_width="@dimen/video_player_rewind_forward_time_padding"
+            android:layout_height="0dp"
+            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@+id/rewind_time"
+            app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
+            app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" />
+
+        <TextView
+            android:id="@+id/rewind_time"
+            style="@style/video_player_advance_control_time"
+            android:text="@string/video_player_rewind_time_sec"
+            app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
+            app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/rewind"
+            app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
+
+        <com.joanzapata.iconify.widget.IconImageButton
+            android:id="@+id/rewind"
+            style="@style/video_player_side_control"
+            android:background="@drawable/ripple_effect"

nodes.bodyText: IMO We move center buttons into a constraint layout instated of placing blank Views (without background).
There is no need of ripple tag, as there is no use of ripple in this case
Make a common method for the animation, create instance only while clicking on the buttons.
Create an animation instance here instated of creating Data Member.
No need to add margins, as the Play/Pause button is already in the circle. Also, delete the corresponding dimens.
New margins are unused need to remove.
IMO better to add _text at the end that describes the style is used in text views.
As per doc The repeat count is 0 by default. so better to remove this statement.
need to remove the comment as the method call is self-explanatory.

commit.message:
Add Rewind/Forward option in Video Player
- LEARNER-7701
- on clicking forward video will be forwarded for 15 sec
- on clicking rewind video will be rewind for 10 sec

afterCommit.message:
Add Rewind/Forward option in Video Player
- LEARNER-7701
- on clicking forward video will be forwarded for 15 sec
- on clicking rewind video will be rewind for 10 sec
